title: Geoffrey Moore on disrupting business with data intelligence
dc:creator: Michael Driscoll
description:
[A]ll the great business disrupters of the past decade [–] Amazon, Google, Microsoft, Apple, Tesla, Uber, Airbnb, Netflix—they are all running Systems of Observation against the data flows they are privileged to access or host, and then feeding them into Systems of Intelligence to extract insights from them. content:encoded:
[A]ll the great business disrupters of the past decade [–] Amazon, Google, Microsoft, Apple, Tesla, Uber, Airbnb, Netflix—they are all running Systems of Observation against the data flows they are privileged to access or host, and then feeding them into Systems of Intelligence to extract insights from them.

Geoffrey Moore, Intelligent Computing Systems: How will Enterprise Architecture Evolve?

The post Geoffrey Moore on disrupting business with data intelligence appeared first on m. e. driscoll.
